name: Crazy Parking Car King 3D HD
description:
Crazy Parking King 3D

[Crazy Parking King is the first "game character" into the parking game]
Let Crazy Parking king more vivid,
If you are a fan of parking must not mistake this 3D casual game yo!

Crazy Parking king game is very simple,
Carefully controlling the game protagonist to drive a car to the designated parking spaces and can cross the border,
Test your patience, technical exciting levels, careless drive too fast but will crash!

Zombie War TightRope Walker Smash Fruit Unicycle Master
Car Parking Experts Fire Electric Pen Rat Run!Knife King Shoot Boss


* Crazy Parking king "game character" into the parking game
* Crazy Parking King stepped clearance system
* Operation provides a unique four 3D camera angles
So you can more accurately grasp clearly the direction and control of the car yo!
Be careful while driving hit a roadside obstacles,
Otherwise the car, but it would explode!
